key_risks: Debt refinancing risks with significant maturities in the near term

Underperformance of the senior housing operating portfolio (SHOP)
High dependency on a limited number of major tenants and operators
Regulatory risks due to changes in healthcare policies or reimbursement rates

social_issues: Commitment to senior living communities amidst financial challenges
governance_issues: Recent leadership changes and strategic initiatives introducing uncertainty
